The file content with the documentation metadata removed is:

<ProgramListing>

<Link id="l00001" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//===-- RISCVMakeCompressible.cpp - Make more instructions compressible ---===//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00002" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00003" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Part of the LLVM Project, under the Apache License v2.0 with LLVM Exceptions.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00004" /><CodeLine lineNumber="4"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// See https://llvm.org/LICENSE.txt for license information.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00005" /><CodeLine lineNumber="5"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// SPDX-License-Identifier: Apache-2.0 WITH LLVM-exception</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00006" /><CodeLine lineNumber="6"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00007" /><CodeLine lineNumber="7"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//===----------------------------------------------------------------------===//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00008" /><CodeLine lineNumber="8"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00009" /><CodeLine lineNumber="9"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This pass searches for instructions that are prevented from being compressed</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00010" /><CodeLine lineNumber="10"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// by one of the following:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00011" /><CodeLine lineNumber="11"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00012" /><CodeLine lineNumber="12"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   1 The use of a single uncompressed register.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00013" /><CodeLine lineNumber="13"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   2 A base register + offset where the offset is too large to be compressed</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00014" /><CodeLine lineNumber="14"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   and the base register may or may not be compressed.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00015" /><CodeLine lineNumber="15"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00016" /><CodeLine lineNumber="16"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00017" /><CodeLine lineNumber="17"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// For case 1, if a compressed register is available, then the uncompressed</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00018" /><CodeLine lineNumber="18"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// register is copied to the compressed register and its uses are replaced.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00019" /><CodeLine lineNumber="19"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00020" /><CodeLine lineNumber="20"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// For example, storing zero uses the uncompressible zero register:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00021" /><CodeLine lineNumber="21"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   sw zero, 0(a0)   # if zero</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00022" /><CodeLine lineNumber="22"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   sw zero, 8(a0)   # if zero</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00023" /><CodeLine lineNumber="23"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   sw zero, 4(a0)   # if zero</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00024" /><CodeLine lineNumber="24"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   sw zero, 24(a0)   # if zero</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00025" /><CodeLine lineNumber="25"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00026" /><CodeLine lineNumber="26"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If a compressed register (e.g. a1) is available, the above can be transformed</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00027" /><CodeLine lineNumber="27"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// to the following to improve code size:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00028" /><CodeLine lineNumber="28"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   li a1, 0</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00029" /><CodeLine lineNumber="29"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   c.sw a1, 0(a0)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00030" /><CodeLine lineNumber="30"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   c.sw a1, 8(a0)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00031" /><CodeLine lineNumber="31"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   c.sw a1, 4(a0)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00032" /><CodeLine lineNumber="32"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   c.sw a1, 24(a0)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00033" /><CodeLine lineNumber="33"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00034" /><CodeLine lineNumber="34"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00035" /><CodeLine lineNumber="35"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// For case 2, if a compressed register is available, then the original base</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00036" /><CodeLine lineNumber="36"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// is copied and adjusted such that:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00037" /><CodeLine lineNumber="37"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00038" /><CodeLine lineNumber="38"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   new&#95;base&#95;register = base&#95;register + adjustment</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00039" /><CodeLine lineNumber="39"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   base&#95;register + large&#95;offset = new&#95;base&#95;register + small&#95;offset</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00040" /><CodeLine lineNumber="40"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00041" /><CodeLine lineNumber="41"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// For example, the following offsets are too large for c.sw:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00042" /><CodeLine lineNumber="42"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   lui a2, 983065</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00043" /><CodeLine lineNumber="43"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   sw  a1, -236(a2)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00044" /><CodeLine lineNumber="44"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   sw  a1, -240(a2)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00045" /><CodeLine lineNumber="45"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   sw  a1, -244(a2)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00046" /><CodeLine lineNumber="46"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   sw  a1, -248(a2)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00047" /><CodeLine lineNumber="47"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   sw  a1, -252(a2)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00048" /><CodeLine lineNumber="48"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   sw  a0, -256(a2)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00049" /><CodeLine lineNumber="49"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00050" /><CodeLine lineNumber="50"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If a compressed register is available (e.g. a3), a new base could be created</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00051" /><CodeLine lineNumber="51"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// such that the addresses can accessed with a compressible offset, thus</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00052" /><CodeLine lineNumber="52"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// improving code size:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00053" /><CodeLine lineNumber="53"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   lui a2, 983065</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00054" /><CodeLine lineNumber="54"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   addi  a3, a2, -256</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00055" /><CodeLine lineNumber="55"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   c.sw  a1, 20(a3)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00056" /><CodeLine lineNumber="56"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   c.sw  a1, 16(a3)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00057" /><CodeLine lineNumber="57"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   c.sw  a1, 12(a3)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00058" /><CodeLine lineNumber="58"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   c.sw  a1, 8(a3)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00059" /><CodeLine lineNumber="59"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   c.sw  a1, 4(a3)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00060" /><CodeLine lineNumber="60"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   c.sw  a0, 0(a3)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00061" /><CodeLine lineNumber="61"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00062" /><CodeLine lineNumber="62"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00063" /><CodeLine lineNumber="63"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This optimization is only applied if there are enough uses of the copied</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00064" /><CodeLine lineNumber="64"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// register for code size to be reduced.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00065" /><CodeLine lineNumber="65"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00066" /><CodeLine lineNumber="66"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//===----------------------------------------------------------------------===//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00067" /><CodeLine lineNumber="67"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00068" /><CodeLine lineNumber="68"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#include &quot;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/riscv/riscv-h">RISCV.h</a>&quot;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00069" /><CodeLine lineNumber="69"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#include &quot;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/riscv/riscvsubtarget-h">RISCVSubtarget.h</a>&quot;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00070" /><CodeLine lineNumber="70"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#include &quot;<a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/passes-h">llvm/CodeGen/Passes.h</a>&quot;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00071" /><CodeLine lineNumber="71"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#include &quot;<a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/registerscavenging-h">llvm/CodeGen/RegisterScavenging.h</a>&quot;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00072" /><CodeLine lineNumber="72"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#include &quot;<a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/mc/targetregistry-h">llvm/MC/TargetRegistry.h</a>&quot;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00073" /><CodeLine lineNumber="73"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#include &quot;<a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h">llvm/Support/Debug.h</a>&quot;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00074" /><CodeLine lineNumber="74"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00075" /><CodeLine lineNumber="75"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">using namespace </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm">llvm</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00076" /><CodeLine lineNumber="76"></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00078" /><CodeLine lineNumber="78" lineLink="#a3a64154fc8a4123e60f8ecc40ad4fada"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#define RISCV&#95;COMPRESS&#95;INSTRS&#95;NAME &quot;RISC-V Make Compressible&quot;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00079" /><CodeLine lineNumber="79"></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00232" /><CodeLine lineNumber="232"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00233" /><CodeLine lineNumber="233"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00234" /><CodeLine lineNumber="234"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00235" /><CodeLine lineNumber="235"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Find a single register and/or large offset which, if compressible, would</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00236" /><CodeLine lineNumber="236"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// allow the given instruction to be compressed.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00237" /><CodeLine lineNumber="237"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00238" /><CodeLine lineNumber="238"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Possible return values:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00239" /><CodeLine lineNumber="239"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00240" /><CodeLine lineNumber="240"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   &#123;Reg, 0&#125;               - Uncompressed Reg needs replacing with a compressed</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00241" /><CodeLine lineNumber="241"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//                            register.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00242" /><CodeLine lineNumber="242"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   &#123;Reg, N&#125;               - Reg needs replacing with a compressed register and</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00243" /><CodeLine lineNumber="243"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//                            N needs adding to the new register. (Reg may be</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00244" /><CodeLine lineNumber="244"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//                            compressed or uncompressed).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00245" /><CodeLine lineNumber="245"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   &#123;RISCV::NoRegister, 0&#125; - No suitable optimization found for this</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00246" /><CodeLine lineNumber="246"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   instruction.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00247" /><CodeLine lineNumber="247" lineLink="#aead7c7f29560bc0cfbfe9959f936b456"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/regimmpair">RegImmPair</a> <a href="#aead7c7f29560bc0cfbfe9959f936b456">getRegImmPairPreventingCompression</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00248" /><CodeLine lineNumber="248"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Opcode = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>.getOpcode();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00249" /><CodeLine lineNumber="249"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00250" /><CodeLine lineNumber="250"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="#a2d9f47f05b39d7fae4d54d338ce32caa">isCompressibleLoad</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>) || <a href="#a512924d8725f22c9bf0e2533214ad6b6">isCompressibleStore</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00251" /><CodeLine lineNumber="251"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineoperand">MachineOperand</a> &amp;MOImm = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>.getOperand(2);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00252" /><CodeLine lineNumber="252"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!MOImm.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineoperand/#a76f61c6784df6dc8402a8b9011041926">isImm</a>())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00253" /><CodeLine lineNumber="253"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/regimmpair">RegImmPair</a>(RISCV::NoRegister, 0);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00254" /><CodeLine lineNumber="254"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00255" /><CodeLine lineNumber="255"><span class="doxyHighlight">    int64&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a> = MOImm.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineoperand/#a38b28a85f818b49d8806c150b8a5b4f7">getImm</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00256" /><CodeLine lineNumber="256"><span class="doxyHighlight">    int64&#95;t NewBaseAdjust = <a href="#aa6ea3e859319dc62613e7d93b73f55d9">getBaseAdjustForCompression</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a>, Opcode);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00257" /><CodeLine lineNumber="257"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/register">Register</a> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sampleprof/#a702f69807459cc25db5754a5f179d3fcaf6fbeb8fa9f451468611536b00878d41">Base</a> = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>.getOperand(1).getReg();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00258" /><CodeLine lineNumber="258"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00259" /><CodeLine lineNumber="259"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Memory accesses via the stack pointer do not have a requirement for</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00260" /><CodeLine lineNumber="260"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// either of the registers to be compressible and can take a larger offset.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00261" /><CodeLine lineNumber="261"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (RISCV::SPRegClass.<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/sandboxir/value-cpp/#a34433c37334a1cde3d58cde3099257dd">contains</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sampleprof/#a702f69807459cc25db5754a5f179d3fcaf6fbeb8fa9f451468611536b00878d41">Base</a>)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00262" /><CodeLine lineNumber="262"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!<a href="#ad90933ddc9bf9bc433b67a7df1bc4f69">compressibleSPOffset</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a>, Opcode) &amp;&amp; NewBaseAdjust)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00263" /><CodeLine lineNumber="263"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/regimmpair">RegImmPair</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sampleprof/#a702f69807459cc25db5754a5f179d3fcaf6fbeb8fa9f451468611536b00878d41">Base</a>, NewBaseAdjust);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00264" /><CodeLine lineNumber="264"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00265" /><CodeLine lineNumber="265"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/register">Register</a> SrcDest = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>.getOperand(0).getReg();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00266" /><CodeLine lineNumber="266"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> SrcDestCompressed = <a href="#a9d7ece2c75d96915529e44cd7e860f5d">isCompressedReg</a>(SrcDest);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00267" /><CodeLine lineNumber="267"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> BaseCompressed = <a href="#a9d7ece2c75d96915529e44cd7e860f5d">isCompressedReg</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sampleprof/#a702f69807459cc25db5754a5f179d3fcaf6fbeb8fa9f451468611536b00878d41">Base</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00268" /><CodeLine lineNumber="268"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00269" /><CodeLine lineNumber="269"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If only Base and/or offset prevent compression, then return Base and</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00270" /><CodeLine lineNumber="270"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// any adjustment required to make the offset compressible.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00271" /><CodeLine lineNumber="271"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ((!BaseCompressed || NewBaseAdjust) &amp;&amp; SrcDestCompressed)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00272" /><CodeLine lineNumber="272"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/regimmpair">RegImmPair</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sampleprof/#a702f69807459cc25db5754a5f179d3fcaf6fbeb8fa9f451468611536b00878d41">Base</a>, NewBaseAdjust);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00273" /><CodeLine lineNumber="273"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00274" /><CodeLine lineNumber="274"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// For loads, we can only change the base register since dest is defined</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00275" /><CodeLine lineNumber="275"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// rather than used.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00276" /><CodeLine lineNumber="276"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00277" /><CodeLine lineNumber="277"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// For stores, we can change SrcDest (and Base if SrcDest == Base) but</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00278" /><CodeLine lineNumber="278"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// cannot resolve an uncompressible offset in this case.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00279" /><CodeLine lineNumber="279"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="#a512924d8725f22c9bf0e2533214ad6b6">isCompressibleStore</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00280" /><CodeLine lineNumber="280"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!SrcDestCompressed &amp;&amp; (BaseCompressed || SrcDest == <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sampleprof/#a702f69807459cc25db5754a5f179d3fcaf6fbeb8fa9f451468611536b00878d41">Base</a>) &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00281" /><CodeLine lineNumber="281"><span class="doxyHighlight">            !NewBaseAdjust)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00282" /><CodeLine lineNumber="282"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/regimmpair">RegImmPair</a>(SrcDest, NewBaseAdjust);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00283" /><CodeLine lineNumber="283"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00284" /><CodeLine lineNumber="284"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00285" /><CodeLine lineNumber="285"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00286" /><CodeLine lineNumber="286"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/regimmpair">RegImmPair</a>(RISCV::NoRegister, 0);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00287" /><CodeLine lineNumber="287"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00288" /><CodeLine lineNumber="288"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00289" /><CodeLine lineNumber="289"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Check all uses after FirstMI of the given register, keeping a vector of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00290" /><CodeLine lineNumber="290"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// instructions that would be compressible if the given register (and offset if</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00291" /><CodeLine lineNumber="291"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// applicable) were compressible.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00292" /><CodeLine lineNumber="292"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00293" /><CodeLine lineNumber="293"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If there are enough uses for this optimization to improve code size and a</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00294" /><CodeLine lineNumber="294"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// compressed register is available, return that compressed register.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00295" /><CodeLine lineNumber="295" lineLink="#aa29e0988d94a53fecfac0bc63e665d06"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/register">Register</a> <a href="#aa29e0988d94a53fecfac0bc63e665d06">analyzeCompressibleUses</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &amp;FirstMI,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00296" /><CodeLine lineNumber="296"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                        <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/regimmpair">RegImmPair</a> RegImm,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00297" /><CodeLine lineNumber="297"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                        <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectorimpl">SmallVectorImpl&lt;MachineInstr &#42;&gt;</a> &amp;MIs) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00298" /><CodeLine lineNumber="298"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock">MachineBasicBlock</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#a5958512eae2979bd2eb383977996a600">MBB</a> = &#42;FirstMI.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr/#a1e855100f407ca4be098d0050be403b0">getParent</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00299" /><CodeLine lineNumber="299"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targetregisterinfo">TargetRegisterInfo</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/machinesink-cpp/#a0f36ed1bc17fc1aa97fe291c439a0698">TRI</a> =</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00301" /><CodeLine lineNumber="301"></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00304" /><CodeLine lineNumber="304"><span class="doxyHighlight">       <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> != <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#abb2b3a60ccc38a28239e19a1646e0c8a">E</a>; ++<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00305" /><CodeLine lineNumber="305"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a> = &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00306" /><CodeLine lineNumber="306"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00307" /><CodeLine lineNumber="307"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Determine if this is an instruction which would benefit from using the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00308" /><CodeLine lineNumber="308"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// new register.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00309" /><CodeLine lineNumber="309"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/regimmpair">RegImmPair</a> CandidateRegImm = <a href="#aead7c7f29560bc0cfbfe9959f936b456">getRegImmPairPreventingCompression</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00310" /><CodeLine lineNumber="310"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (CandidateRegImm.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/regimmpair/#a01278a63480fb29ca90b101e7e4cc2f4">Reg</a> == RegImm.Reg &amp;&amp; CandidateRegImm.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/regimmpair/#a3b82a28d343a8710450f213bd9702897">Imm</a> == RegImm.Imm)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00311" /><CodeLine lineNumber="311"><span class="doxyHighlight">      MIs.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatebase/#af42bfbc067df27c19ee2fc859df58799">push&#95;back</a>(&amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00312" /><CodeLine lineNumber="312"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00313" /><CodeLine lineNumber="313"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If RegImm.Reg is modified by this instruction, then we cannot optimize</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00314" /><CodeLine lineNumber="314"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// past this instruction. If the register is already compressed, then it may</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00315" /><CodeLine lineNumber="315"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// possible to optimize a large offset in the current instruction - this</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00316" /><CodeLine lineNumber="316"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// will have been detected by the preceeding call to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00317" /><CodeLine lineNumber="317"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// getRegImmPairPreventingCompression.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00318" /><CodeLine lineNumber="318"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>.modifiesRegister(RegImm.Reg, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/machinesink-cpp/#a0f36ed1bc17fc1aa97fe291c439a0698">TRI</a>))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00319" /><CodeLine lineNumber="319"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">break</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00320" /><CodeLine lineNumber="320"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00321" /><CodeLine lineNumber="321"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00322" /><CodeLine lineNumber="322"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Adjusting the base costs one new uncompressed addi and therefore three uses</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00323" /><CodeLine lineNumber="323"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// are required for a code size reduction. If no base adjustment is required,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00324" /><CodeLine lineNumber="324"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// then copying the register costs one new c.mv (or c.li Rd, 0 for &quot;copying&quot;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00325" /><CodeLine lineNumber="325"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the zero register) and therefore two uses are required for a code size</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00326" /><CodeLine lineNumber="326"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// reduction.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00327" /><CodeLine lineNumber="327"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (MIs.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatecommon/#a1c479a8c434377c2b8cb056bdfdfc201">size</a>() &lt; 2 || (RegImm.Imm != 0 &amp;&amp; MIs.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatecommon/#a1c479a8c434377c2b8cb056bdfdfc201">size</a>() &lt; 3))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00328" /><CodeLine lineNumber="328"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> RISCV::NoRegister;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00329" /><CodeLine lineNumber="329"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00330" /><CodeLine lineNumber="330"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Find a compressible register which will be available from the first</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00331" /><CodeLine lineNumber="331"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// instruction we care about to the last.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00332" /><CodeLine lineNumber="332"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targetregisterclass">TargetRegisterClass</a> &#42;RCToScavenge;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00333" /><CodeLine lineNumber="333"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00334" /><CodeLine lineNumber="334"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Work out the compressed register class from which to scavenge.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00335" /><CodeLine lineNumber="335"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (RISCV::GPRRegClass.<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/sandboxir/value-cpp/#a34433c37334a1cde3d58cde3099257dd">contains</a>(RegImm.Reg))</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00337" /><CodeLine lineNumber="337"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (RISCV::GPRF16RegClass.<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/sandboxir/value-cpp/#a34433c37334a1cde3d58cde3099257dd">contains</a>(RegImm.Reg))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00338" /><CodeLine lineNumber="338"><span class="doxyHighlight">    RCToScavenge = &amp;RISCV::GPRF16CRegClass;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00339" /><CodeLine lineNumber="339"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (RISCV::GPRF32RegClass.<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/sandboxir/value-cpp/#a34433c37334a1cde3d58cde3099257dd">contains</a>(RegImm.Reg))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00340" /><CodeLine lineNumber="340"><span class="doxyHighlight">    RCToScavenge = &amp;RISCV::GPRF32CRegClass;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00341" /><CodeLine lineNumber="341"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (RISCV::FPR32RegClass.<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/sandboxir/value-cpp/#a34433c37334a1cde3d58cde3099257dd">contains</a>(RegImm.Reg))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00342" /><CodeLine lineNumber="342"><span class="doxyHighlight">    RCToScavenge = &amp;RISCV::FPR32CRegClass;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00343" /><CodeLine lineNumber="343"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (RISCV::FPR64RegClass.<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/sandboxir/value-cpp/#a34433c37334a1cde3d58cde3099257dd">contains</a>(RegImm.Reg))</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00346" /><CodeLine lineNumber="346"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> RISCV::NoRegister;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00347" /><CodeLine lineNumber="347"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00348" /><CodeLine lineNumber="348"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/regscavenger">RegScavenger</a> RS;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00354" /><CodeLine lineNumber="354"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00355" /><CodeLine lineNumber="355"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00356" /><CodeLine lineNumber="356"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Update uses of the old register in the given instruction to the new register.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00357" /><CodeLine lineNumber="357" lineLink="#aae9fa37b9f18ba0e8f4c2342d4346494"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="#aae9fa37b9f18ba0e8f4c2342d4346494">updateOperands</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>, <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/regimmpair">RegImmPair</a> OldRegImm,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00358" /><CodeLine lineNumber="358"><span class="doxyHighlight">                           <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/register">Register</a> NewReg) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00359" /><CodeLine lineNumber="359"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Opcode = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>.getOpcode();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00360" /><CodeLine lineNumber="360"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00361" /><CodeLine lineNumber="361"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If this pass is extended to support more instructions, the check for</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00362" /><CodeLine lineNumber="362"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// definedness may need to be strengthened.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00363" /><CodeLine lineNumber="363"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>((<a href="#a2d9f47f05b39d7fae4d54d338ce32caa">isCompressibleLoad</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>) || <a href="#a512924d8725f22c9bf0e2533214ad6b6">isCompressibleStore</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>)) &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00364" /><CodeLine lineNumber="364"><span class="doxyHighlight">         </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Unsupported instruction for this optimization.&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00365" /><CodeLine lineNumber="365"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00366" /><CodeLine lineNumber="366"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> SkipN = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00367" /><CodeLine lineNumber="367"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00368" /><CodeLine lineNumber="368"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Skip the first (value) operand to a store instruction (except if the store</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00369" /><CodeLine lineNumber="369"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// offset is zero) in order to avoid an incorrect transformation.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00370" /><CodeLine lineNumber="370"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// e.g. sd a0, 808(a0) to addi a2, a0, 768; sd a2, 40(a2)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00371" /><CodeLine lineNumber="371"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="#a512924d8725f22c9bf0e2533214ad6b6">isCompressibleStore</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>) &amp;&amp; OldRegImm.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/regimmpair/#a3b82a28d343a8710450f213bd9702897">Imm</a> != 0)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00372" /><CodeLine lineNumber="372"><span class="doxyHighlight">    SkipN = 1;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00373" /><CodeLine lineNumber="373"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00374" /><CodeLine lineNumber="374"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Update registers</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00375" /><CodeLine lineNumber="375"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineoperand">MachineOperand</a> &amp;MO : <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a02981de53fb6ffd384d39addc4d25f37">drop&#95;begin</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>.operands(), SkipN))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00376" /><CodeLine lineNumber="376"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (MO.isReg() &amp;&amp; MO.getReg() == OldRegImm.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/regimmpair/#a01278a63480fb29ca90b101e7e4cc2f4">Reg</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00377" /><CodeLine lineNumber="377"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Do not update operands that define the old register.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00378" /><CodeLine lineNumber="378"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00379" /><CodeLine lineNumber="379"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The new register was scavenged for the range of instructions that are</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00380" /><CodeLine lineNumber="380"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// being updated, therefore it should not be defined within this range</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00381" /><CodeLine lineNumber="381"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// except possibly in the final instruction.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00382" /><CodeLine lineNumber="382"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (MO.isDef()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00383" /><CodeLine lineNumber="383"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(<a href="#a2d9f47f05b39d7fae4d54d338ce32caa">isCompressibleLoad</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00384" /><CodeLine lineNumber="384"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00385" /><CodeLine lineNumber="385"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00386" /><CodeLine lineNumber="386"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Update reg</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00387" /><CodeLine lineNumber="387"><span class="doxyHighlight">      MO.setReg(NewReg);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00388" /><CodeLine lineNumber="388"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00389" /><CodeLine lineNumber="389"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00390" /><CodeLine lineNumber="390"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Update offset</span></CodeLine>
